language.welcomeIntro: Welcome to the ELAN FingerPrinter Device Driver Setup program. This program will install the ELAN FingerPrinter Device Driver on your computer.
language.eulaHeaderTitle: Review the terms of the license agreement
language.eulaNoButton: I do not accept this agreement
language.installHeaderTitle: Please wait while Setup finishes installing the driver.
language.finishText: Setup has finished installing the ELAN FingerPrinter Device driver.

language.dpinstTitle: ELAN 指紋辨識裝置 驅動程式安裝
language.welcomeIntro: 歡迎蒞臨ELAN指紋辨識裝置驅動程式的設定程式。這個程式可以在電腦上安裝ELAN指紋辨識裝置的驅動程式。
language.installHeaderTitle: 請等待設定程式完成驅動程式的安裝。
language.finishText: 設定程式已經完成ELAN指紋辨識裝置驅動程式的安裝。
